title: Connection Error
body:
Tried logging in and I'm getting a connection error. I have restarted the router however the problem is still occurring. I can log onto NA but not OCE.
Any suggestions?

replies.body:
Hey there Golden Acorn,

I'm no tech wiz so I can't give you an answer to your problem. But what you could do is send a copy of your log to Riot using the SUPPORT feature and they may be able to help.

Best of luck! 
Regards,
lols =)
